attributes.action: to introduce legislation that requires every eligible person to cast a vote in local and general elections, even if that vote is for none of the above to encourage engagement with democracy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is unacceptable that we should hold elections in this country where less than 50% of the voting public demonstrate their views in local and general elections. We all live by the decisions of our elected local government bodies and national government. Therefore it should be incumbent upon all citizens who have the right to vote to exercise their basic right to vote for the people that run the governance in our society. To duck this responsibility is an insult to the basic principles that so many people have sacrificed so much to introduce.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
